means: 改组，改编，整顿( reorganize的过去式和过去分词 )

sentence.Network_en: Four thousand troops have been reorganized into a fighting force.
sentence.Network_cn: 4,000名士兵被重组成为一支战斗部队。

sentence.Network_en: He reorganized Standard Brands twice a year, like clockwork.
sentence.Network_cn: 每年他必对标牌公司进行两次改组。

sentence.Network_en: Medical facilities are being reorganized and upgraded.
sentence.Network_cn: 正在对医疗设施进行重组和升级。

PerfectNetExp.abs: reorganize 组织再生, reorganized 改制, reorganize 重构
Some have extended the school year , or reorganized it to avoid a long break ., 有些学校延长了学年 , 或者重新调整学年避免暑期太长.
Yvonne had reorganized the kitchen , which was now orderly and gleaming ., 伊冯娜重新布置了厨房 , 经她一整 , 现在一切井井有条到处铮明瓦亮.
reorganized properties of solvent in the low density solution ., 低密度溶液中溶剂的重组织性质.

译网情深 - 打印文章 - ... debt ratio 负债比率；债务比率 debt reorganization 债务重整；债务重组 debt repayment 偿还债务.
file record compaction 文件记录压缩file reorganization 文件改编file section 文件节
公司重整（Corporate reorganization）（corporate reorganization）制度，在日本也叫公司更生制度，指陷入经营、财务困境，出现破产原因或有破产原因出现危险 …

entry.tran: 改组;改造;改编;重新安排
entry.def: To reorganize something or to reorganize means to change the way in which something is organized, arranged, or done.

example.ex: It is the mother who is expected to reorganize her busy schedule...
example.tran: 应该让母亲来重新安排自己紧张的日程。

example.ex: Four thousand troops have been reorganized into a fighting force...
example.tran: 4,000名士兵被重组成为一支战斗部队。

auth_sentence.content: France had become a Tabula rasa, and everything had to be reorganized.
auth_sentence.res_content: France had become a Tabula rasa, and everything had to be reorganized.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: France had become a Tabula rasa, and everything had to be reorganized.

auth_sentence.content: In the past two weeks, the banking world and Wall Street have been reorganized by a wave of collapses and mergers.
auth_sentence.res_content: In the past two weeks, the banking world and Wall Street have been reorganized by a wave of collapses and mergers.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: In the past two weeks, the banking world and Wall Street have been reorganized by a wave of collapses and mergers.

auth_sentence.content: By 2007, Unilever reorganized Dove and went back to selling based on features, segments, and new products.
auth_sentence.res_content: By 2007, Unilever reorganized Dove and went back to selling based on features, segments, and new products.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: By 2007, Unilever reorganized Dove and went back to selling based on features, segments, and new products.
